post:
Hi, and thanks for reading our ad! 

We like to think of ourselves as a small and personal, yet professional and forward thinking company. We care about our customers success and aim to give you all the tools and assistance you need to make your stay with us as smooth as possible. If there's anything you're unsure about please feel free to drop us a message!

Welcome to Austenite. We offer miraculously simple and stable Plesk powered web hosting backed by powerful European based servers at rock bottom prices. With 99.9% uptime, a solid money back guarantee and a small team of dedicated, like minded people steering the ship we look forward to welcoming you on board. Join Club Austenite today!

Please take a look below at our pricing, our primary currency is GBP so I've converted the prices into USD for your convenience. Prices are correct as of 27th of November 2016, converted with Yahoo Finance. Exchange rate - 1.2478.

**STARTER**  
-5GB Storage  
-125GB Bandwidth  
-Unlimited MySQL Databases  
-Unlimited Mailboxes  
-Unlimited Domains  
-Plesk 12.5  
-Unlimited FTP Accounts  
-Softaculous Installer  
-LetsEncrypt SSL Certs  
-Free DDOS Protection  
$1.28 per month  
[Buy Now](https://austenite.io/#pricing)
